| HistoryText             = The Ex-Terminators are a veritable army of [[Rocket Raccoon (Earth-616)|Rocket Racoon]]'s ex-girlfriends from across the galaxy. Assembled by [[Amalya (Earth-616)|General Amalya]], they are united by their mutual hatred of Rocket after he dumped and robbed them.{{r|Rocket Raccoon Vol 2 1}}

Amalya's servant Kaleeko attempted to seduce and possibly kill Rocket on their date, but he was taken into custody by Intergalactic Police.{{r|Rocket Raccoon Vol 2 1}} Using a more direct approach, a fleet of Ex-Terminator ships tried to kill him and [[Macho Gomez (Earth-616)|Macho Gomez]] as they escaped custody, but lost them after they warped to a nearby planet.{{r|Rocket Raccoon Vol 2 3}} Eventually, they were able to track him to the surface, where Rocket managed to beat them all in a fist fight.{{r|Rocket Raccoon Vol 1 4}}
